a.n: The Nightmare Neighbour Next Door III (4)

p.k: Documentary series about Britain's feuding neighbours, using CCTV footage and material from victims' own cameras. A mother and daughter's lives are made a misery after they objected to a neighbour's extension plans, and an elderly couple who feel that they are the victims of a noisy neighbour have to deny any wrong doings themselves when the police turn up.
